item.title: First Post
item.description: Welcome to the blug “What is the blug ?” you may ask. Simple, it’s a blog, with bugs. In this blog you will find stuff about me, my findings, my interests….
item.content:
Welcome to the blug

“What is the blug ?” you may ask. Simple, it’s a blog, with bugs.

In this blog you will find stuff about me, my findings, my interests….
